title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are two separate operations. Setting the output location first creates an illegal state.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. Open the project properties and change the settings to use the project as the source folder and the project as the output location.
